Package src

Class Investment

java.lang.Object
src.Investment
Direct Known Subclasses:
MutualFunds, Stock
public abstract class Investment extends Object
The Investment class represents a financial investment with a symbol, name, quantity, price, and book value. This is an abstract class that provides basic functionality for managing an investment. Subclasses should implement the abstract method getGainOnInvestment to calculate the gain on the investment.
